Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey <MYNAME>! What's up?
<PAGE>
Come to absorb more farming wisdom from the
master?
<PAGE>
I gueeeeess I could tell you...if I wasn't so busy
trying to figure out the best way to expand my
fields.
<PAGE>
I mean, these dinky fields will only be a
hindrance on my quest to be the world's greatest
farmer, so I was gonna expand them.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Thing is, I can't figure out where to start.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, what's your opinion, <MYNAME>? Any idea
on the best way to expand these fields?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>C'mon, why not? Heh heh! Come this way.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>See what I've got to deal with? No clue where to
start.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>Where do you think is the prime starting point?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrmmm. Starting from the well fountain and
expanding from there would make the fields
easier to water? Good point!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But there's a bunch of stuff in the way near the
well fountain, so what should I do?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Arrrgh! I don't get it! Instead of explaining, why
don't you just show me? That would be way
faster!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>All right, get to it, <MYNAME>! Just expand the
fields in the same way you were explaining to
me.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Pleeease? I can't bear to hear you explain it but
not be able to do it myself!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Woo-hoo! Thanks, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
You're pretty keen. Okay then, time to get
started!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Aaaaaand done! My master plan for massive field
expansion went off without a hitch!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>Thanks, <MYNAME>. You were a big help! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I suppose I owe you one for this! Oh, I know!
How about you come in and have some tea?
<PAGE>
I'll put on a special blend, just for you! You did a
lot of work today, so kick back and relax, okay?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, um...I know I've said this already, but I'm
really glad I talked this over with you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If you're ever stuck in a tight spot, come see me
and I'll do everything I can to help, okay?
<PAGE>
We might be rivals in farming, but at the end of
the day, we're friends first.
